name: Temple of Portals
description:
Play in full screen. 

The game is 16:9 ratio. If your monitor is 16:10 the edges of some levels may be cut off. 

Summary: This is a platformer but the only way to control your character is by placing portals. The character walks forward automatically. Only one complete portal can be placed at a time, that means one opening end of the portal and one closing end as well. If another portal is placed, the previous portal will disappear.

Controls: Move mouse to position portals, left click or space bar to place portal.

If a glitch is encountered use the restart button on the upper right corner to reset the level.

It’s recommended that you play the levels in order. This way the mechanics are introduced slowly. If there is a level you just can’t get past, you can go to the menu and skip to the  next level.
